scripts.lint: yarn run lint:lslint && yarn run lint:eslint
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "yarn workspace @fullstack-rest-template/frontend run start" "yarn workspace @fullstack-rest-template/backend run start:watch"
scripts.build: yarn workspace @fullstack-rest-template/backend run build && yarn workspace @fullstack-rest-template/frontend run build
scripts.generate:watch: nodemon --delay 3000ms --exec "yarn workspaces run generate" --watch packages/frontend/src --watch packages/backend/src --ext .ts,.tsx
